trans-unit.source: Flask-Stormpath on GitHub: https://github.com/tim-hub/stormpath-flask-plus Documentation almost same with http://flask-stormpath.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
trans-unit.target: Flask-GitHubのStormpath：https：//github.com/tim-hub/stormpath-flask-plus ドキュメントはhttp://flask-stormpath.readthedocs.org/en/latest/とほぼ同じです

trans-unit.source: Simple and more secure user authentication for Flask via Stormpath.
trans-unit.target: Stormpathを介したFlask用のシンプルで安全なユーザー認証。

trans-unit.source: The simplest and most secure way to handle user authentication and authorization with Flask, via Stormpath (https://stormpath.com).
trans-unit.target: Stormpath（https://stormpath.com）を介して、Flaskでユーザー認証と承認を処理するための最も簡単で安全な方法。
